name: Craft Simulator
description:
How To Play

You have 3 quests to fullfill. These quests will be different on each round and will be randomly picked from a pool of quests. 

In order to play the game you have to create several jobs for your worker. Those are:

- Harvesting a tree (requires a tree to be present and your wood pile has space)
- Planting a tree (requires that you've harvested a tree)
- Order Stones (requires that your stone pile has space)

Besidest that you can trigger some build jobs:

- Build Stick (requires 1 Wood)
- Build Brick (requires 1 Stone)
- Build Hammer (requires 1 Wood and 1 Stone)

You can see the assigned tasks on the top of the screen. Your worker will try to solve them from top-to-bottom. Colors tell you the state:

- Blue: Currently running Job
- White: Doable job 
- Grey: Requirements missing

Jobs can become canceled by clicking the X-button behind it (only available for jobs not being started).

You can pause the game any time with keys: [ESC], [P] or [PAUSE]

The whole game was created within 4 days and may or may not receive some more updates.
